column8:
Hayato 
Yuki 
Ōshiro Mugen
Takuma 
Aiko 
Kuma
Shogun
Ryūnosuke
Yabu
Okkoto
Noboru
Masaru
column10:
1) When Hayato finds the convoy, it has already been stopped by a broken bridge.
2) Hayato discovers a young thief (Yuki) as she kills a convoy guard.
3) Both team up and proceed to eliminate the officers in charge of the convoy
4) Once they are finished. They give the signal for Mugen to move in.
5) This mission introduces Yuki, so she must make a strong first impression.
Hayato has snuck close to the weapons transport that he is supposed to attack. He get's a lay of the land, talking to himself in a practical manner.
Alright. That must be the transport. Wonder why it's stopped.
column12: 嗯，那一定是运输车队。奇怪，它怎么停下了。

column10: Hmm … looks like the bridge gave in. That's fine with me ...
column12: 嗯……看起来是卡在桥上了，好机会……

column10: The ones with the flags are the officers. Think I'll kill at least four, just to be safe.
column12: 身上背旗的那些人就是军官。为了保险起见，我至少得杀四名军官。

column10: I'll signal Mugen when I'm done. That statue looks like a good spot.
column12: 搞定之后就给无限发信号。那个雕像位置不错。

column10: Hm ... they are looking for something. Or someone. Better keep my head down.
column12: 嗯……他们正在找啥东西，也许是找某个人。看来要小心行事。

column10: A guard orders another to search the underbrush for Yuki.
column12: A guard orders another to search the underbrush for Yuki.

column10: She must be hiding here somewhere!

Yuki is hidden in a bush and lures a guard to his death.
Hayato notices the scene and moves in to investigate.
column12:
Yuki is hidden in a bush and lures a guard to his death.
Hayato notices the scene and moves in to investigate.

column9:
sees guard die
moves in to investigate

column10: Don't move ... what are you? A lonely wolf?

column9: whirls around and puts his sword at her throat
column10: … A child, huh? You're the one they're looking for.
column12: ……是个小孩，哈？他们就是在找你吧。

column10: N-no they're not! I'm silent like a cat!
column12: 不-不 不是找我！我身手可是很敏捷的！

column10: I saw things on those wagons. They didn't look happy there, so I thought I'd take them with me.
column12: 马车上的货我都看见了。我看那些货物不高兴，所以我想带点货走。

column10: Better run along now. Bad things happen to children out here. Go play somewhere else.
column12: 你现在赶紧离开这里。这里的状况对小孩来说太危险。到其他地方玩去。

column10: You saw my little trap, right? I could help you. If you send me away, I'll just try on my own again.
column12: 你也看到我的小陷阱了，对吧？我能帮上忙。你要是打发我走，我就继续单干。

column9: briefly hesitates, then and puts away his sword
column10: … I don't have time for this ... Fine, you can come along. But you do exactly what I tell you, got it?
column12: …ugh, I don't have time for this. Fine, you can come along. But you do exactly what I tell you—got it?

column10: Yuki tries to move a corpse, which is a slow and tedious affair
column12: Yuki tries to move a corpse, which is a slow and tedious affair

column10: Hayato has just stashed a corpse inside a bush. Carrying corpses is much easier vor him, so Hayato is a little jealous.
column12: Hayato has just stashed a corpse inside a bush. Carrying corpses is much easier vor him, so Hayato is a little jealous.
对你来说简直易如反掌啊。

column10: There's a group of guards around the corner. The situation is more suited to Yuki's abilities than Hayato's
column12: There's a group of guards around the corner. The situation is more suited to Yuki's abilities than Hayato's

column10: Tight spot. This could get messy.
column12: 处境不妙啊。事情变得麻烦了。

column10: Wait. I'll just call them with my bird's voice. They like that.
column12: 等等！我能用鸟声引诱他们！他们喜欢那声音！

column10: A guard has just been killed by a trap that Yuki has set up beforehand.
column12: A guard has just been killed by a trap that Yuki has set up beforehand.

column10: Not bad. Who made you that trap?
column12: 还行。那陷阱谁给你做的？

column10: No one! I built it myself!
column12: 没人给我做！我自己做的！

column10: Hayato has just killed someone with a well aimed shuriken.
column12: Hayato has just killed someone with a well aimed shuriken.

column10: Ooh, shuriken! Can I have one?
column12: 哦，手里剑！能给我一个吗？

column10: Yuki is killing someone with her knife.
column12: Yuki is killing someone with her knife.

column10: I told you: Don't call me that.
As they get to higher ground, the team notices that they can move through the convoy by jumping from wagon to wagon.
column12: As they get to higher ground, the team notices that they can move through the convoy by jumping from wagon to wagon.

column10: Lazy wagons. No one looks up there. Let's jump on top!
column12: 慢吞吞的马车。没人看上面。咱们跳上车吧！
说实话你这主意还不错。

column10: As he is making some daring jumping, Hayato is surpised that Yuki can easily keep up with him.
column12: As he is making some daring jumping, Hayato is surpised that Yuki can easily keep up with him.
平衡能力不错。谁教你的？

column10: The team discovers a lose outcrop of rock that can be dropped on an enemy.
column12: The team discovers a lose outcrop of rock that can be dropped on an enemy.

column10: See that large rock on the cliff? What does it tell you?
column12: 看到悬崖上的那块巨石没？知道那是啥意思吗？

column10: Hm, beautiful stone. Likes to lean over the edge. Maybe she's waiting for someone below.
column12: 嗯，真是块美人石。已经摇摇欲坠了。没准她在等下面的人呢。

column9: has to process her crazy talk
column10: Eh … not the word's I'd choose, but good in theory.
column12: 呃……虽然我不会那样说，但理论上可行。

column10: The team discovers a wagon standing on a slope. It can be let loose so it crushes an enemy.
column12: The team discovers a wagon standing on a slope. It can be let loose so it crushes an enemy.

column10: You see the wagon there? The one with the cannons?
column12: 你看到那边的马车没？装火炮的那辆？

column10: Oh, the wagon's wheels are blocked! He wants to be free!
column12: 哦，那马车的轮子被挡住了！它想要自由！

column10: Then we should remove those brakes.
column12: 那我们就该把那些刹车移走。

column9: has to process her crazy talk
column10: Uhuh … well, if we "free" it at the right time, it could work out for us.
column12: 啊……好吧，要是我们看准时机"放"它走，它还能帮上忙呢。

column10: Hayato notices an officer standing close to a drinking ox. If he throws a stone at the ox, it will run wild and kill the officer.
column12: Hayato notices an officer standing close to a drinking ox. If he throws a stone at the ox, it will run wild and kill the officer.

column10: Oxen … dangerous if provoked. Why not make use of that ...
column12: 公牛……被激怒的话很危险。没准可以利用一下……

column10: The ox? No, he just needs a little poke.
column12: 公牛？不会的，只是稍微刺激他一下。

column10: The team notices a monk being with the convoy.
column12: The team notices a monk being with the convoy.
那人好奇怪，衣服还那么亮……

column10: Huh … yellow robes … why did they take a monk with them?
column12: 呃……黄色长袍……他们为啥还带着位和尚？

column10: Maybe he's praying for safe travel?
column12: 也许他是为了祈祷旅途平安？

column10: Well, he's not doing a good job then.
column12: 好吧，那他绝对是在干坏事。

column10: The team hears a pair of civilians talk.
column12: The team hears a pair of civilians talk.

column10: The men are working hard. I hope we can move soon.
column12: 人们正在努力修桥。希望车队很快就能走了。

column10: The journey was rough, some rest'll do us good.
column12: 旅途劳累，小憩片刻还是不错的。

column10: The team encounters a drunken guard and a servant.
column12: The team encounters a drunken guard and a servant.

column10: I beg you, stop. Your behaviour is disgraceful.
column12: 求求你，住手。你的行为太可耻了。

column10: The team hears a pair of guards talk.
column12: The team hears a pair of guards talk.

column10: How much longer must we wait? This place makes me nervous.
column12: 我们还得等多久？这地方弄得我很紧张。

column10: Calm down. Kage-sama has paid off the local bandits. No one will attack us.
column12: 冷静点儿。影大人已经向当地土匪付过钱了。没人会袭击我们。

column10: An officer is annoyed by how slow the bridge is being repaired.
column12: An officer is annoyed by how slow the bridge is being repaired.
让你一次喝个够，你这头蠢牛。

column10: The team has killed 1 of 4 officers (mission objective).
column12: The team has killed 1 of 4 officers (mission objective).

column10:
An officer is making rounds, talking to the convoy guards.
(use for both officers in this area?)
column12:
An officer is making rounds, talking to the convoy guards.
(use for both officers in this area?)

column10: No one must touch these wagons.
column12: 不要让任何人接近这些马车。

column10: Just keep an eye on the peasants.
The team has killed 2 of 4 officers (mission objective).
column12: The team has killed 2 of 4 officers (mission objective).

column10: A guard informs an officer on the progress with the bridge repair.
column12: A guard informs an officer on the progress with the bridge repair.

column10: The team has killed 3 of 4 officers (mission objective).
column12: The team has killed 3 of 4 officers (mission objective).

column10: Aren't you a bit too good at this?
column12: 这事你咋干得这么熟练？

column10: An officer orders sake from a servant.
column12: An officer orders sake from a servant.

column10: The team has killed 4 of 4 officers (mission objective).
column12: The team has killed 4 of 4 officers (mission objective).

column10: Now we have to signal Mugen at the statue.
column12: 现在我们去雕像那给无限发信号。

column10: An officer mocks a wayshrine at the road.
column12: An officer mocks a wayshrine at the road.

column10: Hayato gives the signal for Mugen's men to attack. Mugen arrives with some men. Once the convoy is confiscated, Mugen meets up with the other two.
column12: Hayato gives the signal for Mugen's men to attack. Mugen arrives with some men. Once the convoy is confiscated, Mugen meets up with the other two.

column9: Fade to show passage of time
Oversees how convoy goods are carried off.
column10: We took the wagons with little resistance. Your skills are as sharp as ever.
column12: 没遇到啥抵抗就拿下了这批马车。你果真名不虚传。

column10: Got to admit, I had a little assistance.
column12: 不得不承认，有人帮了我点小忙。

column10: Ah yes, I saw your companion. What do you think of her?
column12: 啊对，我看到你同伴了。你认为她怎么样？

column10: She's a bit wild maybe, but she has talent.
column12: 虽然有点儿野，但很有天赋。

column10: Either that or I'm getting careless ... How did she sneak up on me …
column12: 要么是她聪明要么是我粗心……她是怎么溜到我背后的……

column10: Nothing. Nothing. See you at the safe house, right?
column12: 没事，没事。安全屋见，对吧？

column10: What is your name, young woman?
A fine name. I am Ōshiro Mugen. No need to be afraid.
column12: 好名字。我是尾城无限。不用害怕。

column10: Are you a friend of Hayato-san?
column12: 你是隼人先生的朋友吗？

column10: I like to think so. Though he might not see it that way.
column12: 我认为是，但他可能不这么看。

column10: Master samurai? Can I stay with you two? Just for a while?
column12: 武士大人？我能留下来跟你们两个在一起吗？一阵就好？

column9: Yuki realizes that she's too close and backs away
column10: I was wondering what to do with you. Hayato-san certainly seemed impressed. Still, to put a child in such danger …
column12: 我不知道该拿你怎么办。隼人先生对你印象深刻。但是，把一个孩子放在如此危险……

column10: Please, I … I want him to be my sensei! He's got tricks that I can learn from no one else!
column12: 拜托了，我……我想让他做我的师傅！他的招数太酷了！
